info.title: KiboPush API
info.description:
Welcome to the KiboPush API documentation! Our API provides flexible tools that can be used in the creation of new, outstanding projects.
Please note that this documentation refers to the API 1.0 version. API 2.0 version is currently under construction and will be released soon.

Build something great!

## Basic Usage
All KiboPush API requests start with `https://app.kibopush.com/api/`

The next segment of the URI path depends on the type of request. For example:

`https://app.kibopush.com/api/users/`

to get information of logged in user.

## Authentication
In order for client application to call our API, he/she would have to attach the following information to the http headers:

  * app_id (the API key)
  * app_secret (the API key secret)


## Error Handling
Errors are returned using standard HTTP error code syntax. In general, codes in the 2xx range indicate success, codes in the 4xx range indicate an error (bad or missing parameters, not authenticated etc.), and codes in the 5xx range indicate an error with KiboPushâ€™s servers. Any additional info is included in the body of the return call, JSON-formatted.

User.description: Basic user information is stored here.

_id.description: Primary key or unique id given to each record

email.description: This is optional. As authentication is done through Facebook, some users may not share their email address.

locale.description: Currently, we just store this value. Later, we would use it to provide more local experience.

gender.description: The values for this depends on what we get from Facebook.

provider.description: Currently, we are only doing authentication with Facebook. Later, we will use other providers too. For now, default value for this is 'facebook'.

timezone.description: We get this value from Facebook.

fbId.description: This is the facebook id of the user who logged in with us.

fbToken.description: This is the facebook token of the user who logged in with us.

profilePic.description: We store the URL of the facebook profile picture of user here.

createdAt.description: Date and time when this record was created.

updatedAt.description: Date and time when this record was last updated.

pagesTourSeen.description: Whether the user has visited the pages or not.

isSuperUser.description: Whether the user is a super user or not

getStartedSeen.description: Whether the user has seen the get started guide or not

dashboardTourSeen.description: Whether the user has seen the dashboard or not

workFlowsTourSeen.description: Whether the user has visited the workflows page or not

surveyTourSeen.description: Whether the user has visited the surveys page or not

convoTourSeen.description: Whether the user has visited the braodcasts page or not

pollTourSeen.description: Whether the user has visited the polls page or not

growthToolsTourSeen.description: Whether the user has visited the growth tools page or not

subscriberTourSeen.description: Whether the user has visited the subscribers page or not

liveChatTourSeen.description: Whether the user has visited the live chat page or not

autoPostingTourSeen.description: Whether the user has visited the auto posting page or not

mainMenuTourSeen.description: Whether the user has visited the main menu page or not

subscribeToMessengerTourSeen.description: Whether the user has visited the subscribe to messenger page or not

Broadcast.description: Broadcasts are the messages that we want to send to our facebook page audience. These can be platform specific. In v1, the platform value is 'facebook' only.

_id.description: Primary key or unique id given to each record

platform.description: Name of the platform used for sending broadcast. In v1, the platform value is 'facebook' only.

payload.description: The attached data like file, image etc

items.description: The payload array would have different types of objects with different json structure. So, for now, we will provide a link that will tell the json structure

type.description: This can be either text or attachment.

fileurl.description: The url of the file to send

attachmentType.description: Type of attachement like file, image etc

isSegmented.description: Whether this broadcast is segmented or not

items.description: The ids of the pages to send broadcast from
The locale of the subscribers to send broadcast to
The genders of the subscribers to send broadcast to

segmentationTimeZone.description: The timezone of the subscriber to send broadcast to

datetime.description: Date and time when this record was created.

items.description: The tags of the subscribers to send survey to
The list of the subscribers to send survey to

isList.description: Whether to send this survey to a list or not

Page_Broadcast.description: This is broadcast and page association table. We would use this to know which broadcast was sent to audience of which page. We can send broadcasts to multiple pages.

_id.description: Primary key or unique id of the record

pageId.description: Primary key or unique id of the page.

userId.description: Primary key or user id of the user.

subscriberId.description: The id of the subscriber to send broadcast to

broadcastId.description: Primary key or unique id of the broadcast sent.

datetime.description: Date and time when this record was created.

seen.description: whether the subscriber has seen the broadcast or not

Page_Poll.description: This is poll and page association table. We would use this to know which poll was sent to audience of which page. We can send polls to multiple pages.

_id.description: The unique id of the record

pageId.description: Primary key or unique id of the page.

userId.description: Primary key or user id of the user.

pollId.description: Primary key or unique id of the poll sent.

datetime.description: Date and time when this record was created.

subscriberId.description: Id of the subscriber to whom the poll is sent

seen.description: whether the subscriber has seen the poll yet or not

Page_Survey.description: This is survey and page association table. We would use this to know which survey was sent to audience of which page. We can send survey to multiple pages.

pageId.description: Primary key or unique id of the page.

userId.description: Primary key or user id of the user.

surveyId.description: Primary key or unique id of the survey sent.

datetime.description: Date and time when this record was created.

Page.description: Here we would store the pages of user which are either connected or not.

_id.description: The unique page id

pageId.description: Page id is the unique id of the facebook page provided to us by Facebook.

pageName.description: This is the name of the page.

accessToken.description: This is the facebook token of the page

pagePic.description: This is the display picture of the page.

likes.description: How many likes a page currently has.

connected.description: Has user connected this page with KiboPush or not. If not connected, then user can't send broadcasts to followers of this page.

userId.description: The unique id of the user.

adminSubscriberId.description: The subscriber id of the admin of the page

Poll.description: This is the main table for polls that are created to send to page audience in messenger.

_id.description: The unique id of the record

platform.description: Name of the platform used for sending poll. In v1, the platform value is 'facebook' only.

items.description: Answer options given for a poll

userId.description: The unique id of the user who has created the poll

datetime.description: Date of creation

isSegmented.description: Whether this poll is segmented or not

items.description: The ids of the pages to send poll from
The locale of the subscribers to send poll to
The genders of the subscribers to send poll to

segmentationTimeZone.description: The timezone of the subscriber to send poll to

items.description: The tags of the subscribers to send poll to
The list of the subscribers to send poll to
Send poll to subscribers who replied to previous polls

isList.description: Whether to send this poll to a list or not

Poll_Response.description: Responses to the poll given by facebook page audience is stored here.

_id.description: The unique id of the record

response.description: Reponse text or body goes here

pollId.description: This is the poll id for which response is given

subscriberId.description: Subscriber Id is the id of facebook user who subscribed to your page and gave response to this poll.

datetime.description: Date of creation

Subscriber.description: Subscribers are the facebook users who follow your page. All the required information about them is stored in this table.

_id.description: The unique id of the subscriber.

pageScopedId.description: Every facebook user who subscribes a page gets page scoped id.

timezone.description: Current time zone of the subscriber

senderId.description: Sender id of the subscriber is used to send message

profilePic.description: Profile picture of the subscriber. We only save the URL of the picture provided to us by Facebook.

coverPhoto.description: Cover photo of the subscriber. We only save the URL of the picture provided to us by Facebook.

userId.description: User Id of the admin of that page.

isSubscribed.description: Whether the user is subscribed or not

isSubscribedByPhoneNumber.description: Whether the user subscribed through a phone number

companyId.description: id of the company the user belongs to

dateTime.description: date and time the subscriber subscribed

Survey.description: The record of the survey created by user. This is main table for survey. Other linked tables are Survey_Questions and Survey_Response

_id.description: the unique id of the record

userId.description: User Id of the admin of that page.

datetime.description: Date of creation

isresponded.description: The number of responses of a survey

isSegmented.description: Whether this survey is segmented or not

items.description: The ids of the pages to send survey from
The locale of the subscribers to send survey to
The genders of the subscribers to send survey to

segmentationTimeZone.description: The timezone of the subscriber to send survey to

items.description: The tags of the subscribers to send survey to
The list of the subscribers to send survey to
Send survey to subscribers who replied to previous surveys

isList.description: Whether to send this survey to a list or not

EditSurvey.description: The table contains information for editing a survey

_id.description: Unique id of the record

Survey_Response.description: Here we store the responses coming for each question of the survey by subscribers

_id.description: The unique id of the record

surveyId.description: Unique id of the survey, question of which, answer belongs to

questionId.description: Unique Id of the question to which answer belongs to

subscriberId.description: Unique id of facebook page follower who gave this answer

datetime.description: Date of creation

Survey_Question.description: Here we store the questions which belong to a survey. This table is associated with Survey table.

_id.description: The unique id of the record

statement.description: This is the statement of the question

items.description: Answer options given for a question

type.description: Type of question, possible values are 'text', 'multichoice'

surveyId.description: Unique id of the survey to which question belongs

datetime.description: Date of creation

createSurvey.description: The record of the survey created by user. This is main table for survey. Other linked tables are Survey_Questions and Survey_Response

isSegmented.description: Whether this survey is segmented or not

items.description: The ids of the pages to send survey from
The locale of the subscribers to send survey to
The genders of the subscribers to send survey to

Create_Survey_Question.description: Here we store the questions which belong to a survey. This table is associated with Survey table.

statement.description: This is the statement of the question

items.description: Answer options given for a question

type.description: Type of question, possible values are 'text', 'multichoice'

Workflow.description: This table is used to store workflows. This is an experimental feature in v1.

_id.description: The unique id of the record

items.description: Keywords are the words in the facebook page subscribers message which will trigger this workflow

reply.description: Reply which will be sent to user before triggerring the workflow

userId.description: Unique id of the user which creates workflow for his/her pages

sent.description: Number of times this workflow is triggerred.

isActive.description: Whether this workflow is enabled or disabled

datetime.description: Date of creation

Autoposting.description: This table is used to store the facebook page, twitter account or youtube channel information.

_id.description: Unique id of the autopost

userId.description: Unique id of the admin of the page

accountTitle.description: Whether it is a facebook page, twitter account or a youtube channel

subscriptionUrl.description: The URL of a facebook page, twitter account or a youtube channel

payload.description: details of the admin of the facebook page, twitter account or youtube channel

profile_image_url.description: The URL of the profile picture

isActive.description: Whether this autoposting is enabled or not

isSegmented.description: Whether this autoposting is segmented or not

items.description: The ids of the pages to send autoposting from
The locale of the subscribers to send autoposting to
The genders of the subscribers to send autoposting to

segmentationTimeZone.description: The timezone of the subscriber to send autoposting to

LiveChat.description: This table is used to store all the chats information

_id.description: The unique id of the record

sender_id.description: The page id or subscriber id who sends the message

recipient_id.description: The id of the subscriber who receives the message

sender_fb_id.description: The page id or  facebook subscriber id who sends the message

recipient_fb_id.description: The facebook id of the subscriber who receives the message

company_id.description: This is admin id till we have companies

datetime.description: The date and time when the message is sent

Menu.description: This table is used to store main menu details

_id.description: The unique id of the record

pageId.description: The unique id of the page

userId.description: The unique id of the the user

jsonStructure.description: The json structure of the menu items and their types

Menu1.description: This table is used to store main menu details

pageId.description: The unique id of the page

userId.description: The unique id of the the user

payload.description: The menu items in the format of the persistent api

jsonStructure.description: The json structure of the menu items and their types

PollTemplate.description: This table is used to store the template polls

_id.description: unique id of the record

datetime.description: The date and time at which the poll is created

items.description: The oprions of the poll

SurveyTemplate.description: This table is used to store the template surveys

_id.description: unique id of the record

datetime.description: The date and time at which the survey is created

SurveyQuestion.description: This table is used to store the template surveys

statement.description: The statement of the survey question

items.description: The options of the question

BroadcastTemplate.description: This table is used to store the template broadcasts

_id.description: unique id of the record

items.description: the content of the broadcast

datetime.description: The date and time at which the broadcast is created

BroadcastTemplateEdit.description: This table is used to store the template broadcasts

_id.description: unique id of the record

items.description: the content of the broadcast

datetime.description: The date and time at which the broadcast is created

Graph.description: gives the number of broadcasts, surveys or polls made along with the date

_id.description: The year, month and date on which broadcast, survey or poll is made

count.description: number of polls, surveys or broadcasts

SentSeenResponses.description: gives the number of polls and surveys sent, seen and responded

sent.description: The number of polls, surveys or broadcasts that are sent

seen.description: The number of polls, surveys or broadcasts that are seen

responses.description: The number of polls, surveys or broadcasts that are responded

Session.description: This table is used to store Facebook session information

_id.description: The unique id of the record

company_id.description: This is admin id till we have companies

request_time.description: The date and time at which the session is created

Category.description: This table is used to store categories for templates

_id.description: unique id of the record

CategoryEdit.description: This table is used to store categories for templates

_id.description: unique id of the record

List.description: This table is used to store customer lists

datetime.description: Date and time at which the list is created

items.description: The subscriber ids

conditions.description: the conditions to create a list

initialList.description: If it is a global list or not

ListEdit.description: This table is used to store customer lists

_id.description: The unique id of the record

userId.description: Id of the user

datetime.description: Date and time at which the list is created

items.description: The subscriber ids

conditions.description: the conditions to create a list

initialList.description: If it is a global list or not

TeamAgents.description: This table is used to store team agents information

TeamPages.description: This table is used to store team pages information

_id.description: The unique id of the record

Teams.description: This table is used to store team information

_id.description: The unique id of the record

Tags.description: This table is used to store tags information

TagSubscribers.description: This table is used to store tag subscribers information

_id.description: The unique id of the record

Invitation.description: This table is used to store invitations information

Company.description: This table is used to store company's information

_id.description: The unique id of the record

CompanyUser.description: This table is used to store company's information

_id.description: The unique id of the record

Autoposting_Message.description: This table is used to store autoposting message information

_id.description: The unique id of the record

userId.description: unique id of user

datetime.description: date and time of creation of this record

Bot.description: This table is used to store bot information

_id.description: The unique id of the record

userId.description: unique id of user

datetime.description: date and time of the creation of this bot

payload.description: array of questions and answers of the bot

_id.description: unique id of particular question/answer combo

Sequence.description: This table is used to store seauence information

_id.description: unique id of the record

companyId.description: company id of the company that the user belongs to

userId.description: user id

datetime.description: date and time of creation of the sequence

AbandonedStore.description: This table is used to store the abandoned store information

_id.description: unique id of the record

userId.description: user Id of the creator

companyId.description: company id of the company that the user belongs to

pageId.description: page id of the page connected

shopUrl.description: URL of the store object linked

shopToken.description: Unique token of the shop provided by shopify

isActive.description: Either the store is in active state or non active state

AbandonedAnalytics.description: This table stores analytics against a store

_id.description: unique id of the record

storeId.description: unique id of the store the analytics belong to

totalExtraSales.description: total amount generated by purchases of customers after using kibopush

totalAbandonedCarts.description: total number of abandoned carts created against the store

totalPurchasedCarts.description: total number of carts which converted to sales

totalSubscribers.description: total number of subscriber of that store from shopify

totalPushSent.description: total number of push messages sent to subscriber

AbandonedCheckout.description: This table stores the abandoned checkouts

_id.description: unique id of the record

shopifyCheckoutId.description: unique shopify id of the checkout

checkoutToken.description: unique token of the abandoned checkout

cartToken.description: unique token of the cart belong to the checkout

storeId.description: unique id of the store the analytics belong to

userId.description: user Id of the creator

companyId.description: company id of the company that the user belongs to

totalPrice.description: total amount of value added to cart

abandonedCheckoutUrl.description: URL to visit the abandoned checkout

status.description: Either the cart is pending, sent or seen

userRef.description: unique id from which Facebook recognizes the subscriber

productIds.description: IDs of the products added to the abandoned checkout

created_at.description: the date object at which the checkout was created

scheduled_at.description: the date object at which the checkout was created

isPurchased.description: Either the cart is purchased or not

isExtraSales.description: Either the purchase was made after sending push or not

SequenceMessage.description: This table is used to store sequence message information

_id.description: unique id of the record

SequenceSubscriber.description: This table is used to store sequence subscribers

companyId.description: Id of the company that the user belongs to

datetime.description: date and time of when this subscriber subscribed

AutomationQueue.description: This table is used to store automation queue

automatedMessageId.description: Id of the automated message i.e. survey, poll etc.

subscriberId.description: Id of the subscriber to which automated message should be sent

companyId.description: Id of the company that the user belongs to

type.description: whether the automated message is survey, poll, broadcast

FacebookPost.description: This table is used to store facebook posts information

_id.description: unique id of the record

pageId.description: the id of the page to post from

companyId.description: company id of the company that the user belongs to

userId.description: user id

datetime.description: date and time of creation of the post

items.description: the content of the post

reply.description: reply to the comment on the post

items.description: reply only if these keywords are present in the comment
do not reply if these keywords are present in the comment

count.description: the number of comments on the post

Webhook.description: This table is used to store facebook webhooks information

_id.description: unique id of the record

pageId.description: the id of the page to set webhook for

companyId.description: company id of the company that the user belongs to

webhook_url.description: The url to send info to

isEnabled.description: Whether the webhook is enabled or not

WebhookEdit.description: This table is used to store facebook webhooks information

_id.description: unique id of the record

webhook_url.description: The url to send info to

isEnabled.description: Whether the webhook is enabled or not

Permissions.description: This table is used to store the permissions of a user

companyId.description: company id of the company that the user belongs to

userId.description: payload for the user object

subscriberPermission.description: permission to use the subscriber page

pollsPermission.description: permission to use the poll feature

pagesAccessPermission.description: permission to see the page tab

menuPermission.description: permission to see and use the menu

livechatPermission.description: permission to use the livechat feature

autopostingPermission.description: permission to use the autoposting feature

broadcastPermission.description: permission to use the broadcast feature

invitationsPermission.description: permission to use the invite feature

deleteAgentPermission.description: permission to use the delete agent

updateRolePermission.description: permission to update the role of a user

memberPermission.description: permission to view and update the members of the team

companyUpdatePermission.description: permission to update the company details

billingPermission.description: permission to view the billing plans
